name: Mediation Online LLC
description: Developer of an online mediation platform intended to assist in solving extrajudicial legal conflicts. The company's platform allows its users to resolve disputes between two or more parties by being connected to legal counsels and assists them in drawing up an agreement with an automated, binding mediation process, enabling Brazilian corporations and consumers to resolve legal disputes quickly and inexpensively without having to rely on third-party legal contractors, making the process fast and effective.
